      • getLexicalAnchor

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLexicalAnchor(IRTreeNode root)
        Finds the deepest, leftmost connected chain of terminal nodes in the tree.
        Specified by:
        getLexicalAnchor in interface AnchorStrategy
        Parameters:
        root - root node of the tree to find anchors in
        Returns:
        the anchor elements satisfying the specification

      • findAnchors

        private void findAnchors(IRTreeNode node)
        Traverses the tree in pre-order. Adds term nodes to anchor list, if there aren't other leaf nodes between them. If there is a term node and there is already a term chain the anchors list, use it if it is a deeper node than the previous ones.
        Parameters:
        node - tree root of the tree to search in.
